name: PirateBOOM
description:
After FrogPack I was curios about other functionalities of Construct3 so I built in
another few hours this little game. It's very poor in content beacause of the 50 events limitation of the free version of Construct3 which forced me to think about the essential and here it is:
A little pirate wants to rebuild his ship: help him to avoid the bombs, get the rum if he's running out of life and gather as much wood as you can!

Use WASD for movement.

Programming: Mauro Cirafisi
Music: Angelo Carnemolla
Art: Pixel Frog
